name: myriapod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of a group of small creatures that have long bodies and many sections with legs, for example centipedes and millipedes: A centipede is strictly speaking a myriapod and not an insect. Myriapods have the ability to maneuver in tight and twisting spaces.
More examplesFewer examplesMyriapods may have up to 750 legs or fewer than ten legs. Myriapods are arthropods with one pair of antennae, two or three pairs of mouthparts and many pairs of legs.His paper studies myriapod segmentation.
